translations: n.蒲式耳（容量单位, bushel 的复数）

phrs.translation: 容积换算, 一公吨折合蒲式耳

sentences.sentence: I had nearly two bushels of rice and two and a half bushels of wheat.
sentences.translation: 我有将近两蒲式耳的大米和两蒲式耳半的小麦。

sentences.sentence: As for the bushels of sketches and studies which Millet produced in the last six weeks, well, it would astonish you to know the figure we sell them at nowadays.
sentences.translation: 至于米勒在过去六个星期里创作的大量的速写和习作，嗯，如果你知道我们现在销售它们的价格，你会大吃一惊的。

sentences.sentence: Last year, an acre of corn produced an average of 162 bushels.
sentences.translation: 而到了去年，一英亩土地的玉米，产量平均可达162蒲式耳。
